r.d: This extension allows you to access Oracle databases. It can be built with PHP 4.3.9 to 5.x. It can be linked with Oracle 9.2, 10.2, 11.1, or 11.2 client libraries.
r.n: Added oci_client_version() returning the runtime Oracle client library version Made OCI8 extension buildable with PHP 5.4-development code
